DataElement.preferredName: Household Survey Needed Medical Care or Prescription Medicine but Unable to Afford it Medical Care or Medicine Need Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response of whether members of household needed medical care or prescription medicine but were unable to afford.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Household Survey Needed Medical Care or Prescription Medicine but Unable to Afford it
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._A question about whether a household member was unable to get  needed medical care or a prescription medicine because the family couldn't afford it.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Medical Care or Medicine Need Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: Not either one; not the one or the other.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not either one; not the one or the other.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention.: The branches of medical science that deal with nonsurgical techniques.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
A verbal or written order given by an authorized person instructing a patient to obtain and use a medical device, prescription or undergo a procedure.
The branches of medical science that deal with nonsurgical techniques.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.: Services obtained from a medical professional for the maintenance of health, prevention of illness, and treatment of illness or injury.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Because of the financial impact of your child's leukemia and treatment was there a time since your child's diagnosis when you or another household member needed medical care or a prescription medicine but were unable to get it because your family could not afford it?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
